electronAboutDescription: Το Anytype είναι ένα λογισμικό επόμενης γενιάς, που καταρρίπτει τα εμπόδια μεταξύ εφαρμογών, επαναφέρει την ιδιωτικότητα και την κυριότητα δεδομένων στους χρήστες.
electronAboutCopyright: Δημιουργήθηκε από την Any — μια Ελβετική οργάνωση 🇨🇭
electronMenuShowTray: Εμφάνιση του  Anytype στο πλαίσιο συστήματος
authInviteLabel: Εισάγετε τον κωδικό πρόσκλησής σας. Εάν δε διαθέτετε έναν, επισκεφθείτε το anytype.io για να εγγραφείτε για την πρώιμη πρόσβαση. Προσκαλούμε νέους δοκιμαστές σε κυλιόμενη βάση.
authSelectLabel:
Δημιουργήστε και συνεργαστείτε σε χώρους που διαθέτετε.
Κρυπτογραφημένο, εκτός σύνδεσης και open.
authDisclaimer: Συνεχίζοντας, συμφωνείτε με τους Όρους Χρήσης και την Πολιτική Ιδιωτικότητας μας.
authDeleteTitleDeleted: Τα δεδομένα του λογαριασμού αφαιρέθηκαν από τον κόμβο αντιγράφων ασφαλείας
authDeleteDescription: Λυπούμαστε που φεύγετε. Μόλις ζητήσετε να διαγραφεί ο λογαριασμός σας, έχετε 30 ημέρες να ακυρώσετε το αίτημά σας. Μετά από 30 ημέρες, τα δεδομένα του λογαριασμού σας θα αφαιρεθούν οριστικά από τον κόμβο αντιγράφων ασφαλείας, και δε θα μπορείτε να συνδεθείτε στο Anytype από νέες συσκευές.
authDeleteDescriptionDeleted: Όλες οι συνδεδεμένες συσκευές μπορεί να έχουν αποθηκευμένα τα δεδομένα σας τοπικά. Ωστόσο, δεν μπορείτε να συνδεθείτε στο Anytype από νέες συσκευές χρησιμοποιώντας τη Φράση Κλειδί.
authDeleteRemovePopupTitle: Είστε σίγουροι ότι θέλετε να διαγράψετε τα τοπικά δεδομένα του λογαριασμού σας;
authDeleteRemovePopupText: Αυτά τα αντικείμενα θα διαγραφούν οριστικά. Δεν μπορείτε να αναιρέσετε αυτή την ενέργεια.
authOnboardMoreInfo: Μπορείτε να βρείτε τη Φράση Κλειδί αργότερα στις ρυθμίσεις του Anytype
authOnboardVaultLabel:
Όλα είναι κρυπτογραφημένα.
Είναι local-first - όλα λειτουργούν εκτός σύνδεσης.
Μόνο εσείς έχετε τη Φράση Κλειδί.
authOnboardSoulLabel:
Το βλέπουν μόνο άνθρωποι με τους οποίους μοιράζεστε κάτι.
Δεν υπάρχει κεντρική καταχώρηση για αυτά τα ονόματα.
authOnboardPhraseLabel:
Σας δίνει πλήρη ιδιοκτησία στο θησαυ/κιο σας.
Δεν μπορεί να ανακτηθεί. Διαβάστε περισσότερα
usecase2Label: Διαχειριστείτε τα προσωπικά σας έργα και εργασίες με απόλυτη ιδιωτικότητα
usecase3Label: Δημιουργήστε τη δική σας γνωσιακή βάση με βιβλία, ταινίες, συνταγές και άλλα
usecase4Label: Διατηρήστε τις καθημερινές σας σημειώσεις και τους προσωπικούς σας συλλογισμούς με ασφάλεια και ιδιωτικότητα
usecase5Label: Δομήστε και παρουσιάστε τις σκέψεις σας αποτελεσματικά. Ένας πίνακας εργαλείων για τα γραπτά σας
pageMainEmptyDescription: Επιλέξτε ένα Αντικείμενο για να εμφανίζεται όταν συνδέεστε. Μπορείτε πάντα να το αλλάξετε αργότερα στις Ρυθμίσεις.
pageMainNavigationItemEmptyTitle: Το Αντικείμενο δεν μπορεί να εμφανιστεί
pageMainStoreTypesTitle:
Οι Τύποι είναι σαν κατηγορίες που
σας βοηθούν να ομαδοποιήσετε και να διαχειριστείτε
τα Αντικείμενά σας.
pageMainStoreTypeEmpty: Η λίστα Τύπων σας είναι άδειαΠροσθέστε μερικούς από τη Βιβλιοθήκη του Anytype χρησιμοποιώντας το εικονίδιο αναζήτησης, ή δημιουργήστε δικούς σας μέσω του παραπάνω κουμπιού
pageMainStoreRelationsTitle:
Όλα τα Αντικείμενα είναι συνδεδεμένα.
Χρησιμοποιήστε Σχέσεις για να δημιουργήσετε συνδέσεις μεταξύ Αντικειμένων.
pageMainStoreRelationsEmpty: Η λίστα Σχέσεών σας είναι άδειαΠροσθέστε μερικές από τη Βιβλιοθήκη του Anytype χρησιμοποιώντας το εικονίδιο αναζήτησης, ή δημιουργήστε δικές σας μέσω του παραπάνω κουμπιού
pageMainStoreBannerTitle: Τι μπορώ να φτιάξω με το Anytype;
pageMainTypeNoTemplates: Αυτός ο Τύπος Αντικειμένου δεν έχει Πρότυπα
pageAuthDeletedAccountDeletionTitle: Αυτό το θησαυ/κιο έχει προγραμματιστεί για διαγραφή στο %s
pageAuthSetupImportText: Τώρα χρησιμοποιείτε τη νέα & βελτιωμένη έκδοση του Anytype. Είναι ακόμα κρυπτογραφημένη, εκτός σύνδεσης και η ασφαλέστερη εφαρμογή για τα προσωπικά σας δεδομένα. Είμαστε ενθουσιασμένοι να ακούσουμε τα σχόλιά σας σχετικά με τις νέες λειτουργίες. Πρώτα, ας εισάγουμε τα δεδομένα σας.
setText: Επιλέξτε ένα Αντικείμενο για αυτό το Σύνολο
blockTextHeader1: Μεγάλος τίτλος κεφαλαίου, παραγράφου, ή τμήματος
blockTextCheckbox: Δημιουργήστε και παρακολουθήστε εργασίες με Λίστα Εργασιών
blockTextImage: Ανεβάστε και εμπλουτίστε τη σελίδα με εικόνα
blockTextBookmark: Αποθηκεύστε τον αγαπημένο σας σύνδεσμο με περίληψη
blockTextSet: Προσθήκη υπάρχουσας ή δημιουργία καινούργιας υπό έλεγχο σειράς για αυτό το Αντικείμενο.
blockTextCollection: Προσθήκη υπό έλεγχο συλλογής για αντικείμενα με διαφορετικές ιδιοκτησίες
blockTextToggleEmpty: Άδειος διακόπτης. Κάντε κλικ ή αφήστε το μπλοκ μέσα.
blockDataviewCreateNewTooltipCollection: Δημιουργία καινούργιου αντικειμένου σε αυτήν τη Συλλογή
blockDataviewEmptyTargetDescription:
Συνδέστε ένα από τα δικά σας %s ή δημιουργήστε ένα νέο
για να συνεχίσετε
blockDataviewEmptySourceDescription:
Προσθήκη ερωτήματος αναζήτησης για ομαδοποίηση Αντικείμενων με ίδιους
Τύπους και Σχέσεις σε ζωντανή λειτουργία
blockDataviewEmptyViewDescription: Δημιουργήστε το πρώτο σας για να ξεκινήσετε
blockDataviewBoardRelationDeletedDescrip: Επιλέξτε άλλη Σχέση για ομαδοποίηση του Κάνμπαν σας
blockFileError: Παρουσιάστηκε ένα σφάλμα κατά τη μεταφόρτωση του αρχείου
blockBookmarkError: Παρουσιάστηκε ένα σφάλμα κατά την ανάκτηση της διεύθυνσης URL
blockEmbedLatexEmpty: Here your equation will be rendered with . Click to edit
blockEmbedOffline: You are not connected to the Internet
blockTableOfContentsAdd: Προσθέστε κεφαλίδες για δημιουργία ενός πίνακα περιεχομένων
popupSettingsPersonalDefaultObjectTypeDe: Set the default type for newly created objects
popupSettingsAppearancePersonalisationSi: Αυτόματη εμφάνιση και απόκρυψη της πλαϊνής μπάρας
popupSettingsWallpaperText: Επιλέξτε, ή μεταφορτώστε ταπετσαρία. Για καλύτερα αποτελέσματα, μεταφορτώστε εικόνα υψηλής ανάλυσης.
popupSettingsMobileQRSubTitle: Log in your vault on Android and iOS
popupSettingsMobileQRText: Launch Anytype app, tap “Login” and then “Scan QR code”. Reveal and scan the code below to login to your vault.
popupSettingsPhraseStub: Παίρνεις το κόκκινο χάπι, παραμένεις στη Χώρα των Θαυμάτων, και θα σου δείξω πόσο βαθιά πάει η κουνελότρυπα.
popupSettingsPhraseText: Your key protects your vault. You'll need it to sign in if you don't have access to your devices. Keep it in a safe place. Click to show:
popupSettingsPinText: The Pin Code will protect your Key. As we do not store your Key or Pin Code and do not ask for your e-mail or phone number, it is impossible to recover your data without this information. So, please, remember or write it down somewhere in a safe place.
popupSettingsPinVerify: Για να συνεχίσετε, επιβεβαιώστε πρώτα ότι είστε εσείς. Εισάγετε τον τρέχοντα Κωδικό PIN
popupSettingsPinSelectError: Οι Κωδικοί PIN δε συμφωνούν, παρακαλώ προσπαθήστε ξανά
popupSettingsDataManagementLocalStorageT: Για να εξοικονομήσετε χώρο στην τοπική συσκευή σας, μπορείτε να αποφορτώσετε όλα σας τα αρχεία στον κρυπτογραφημένο μας κόμβο αποθήκευσης. Τα αρχεία θα φορτωθούν ξανά πίσω όταν τα ανοίξετε.

In order to save space on this device, you can remove all your files. Be careful: your client is in local-only mode, and data is not backing up to external nodes. Ensure that your files are synced to your other devices before removing them.
popupSettingsDataManagementDeleteText: Once you request your vault to be deleted, you have 30 days to cancel this request. After 30 days, your encrypted vault data is permanently removed from the backup node, you won't be able to sign into Anytype on new devices.
popupSettingsSpaceIndexDescriptionPlaceh: Add a few words about the space...
popupSettingsSpaceIndexSpaceTypePersonal: This space was created with end-to-end encryption, ensuring the privacy and security of user data and allowing for confident online or offline interaction.
popupSettingsSpaceIndexShareShareText: Generate invite link and share the space with other members
popupSettingsSpaceIndexShareDefaultText: Entry space can’t be shared. Create a new one to share
popupSettingsSpaceIndexShareInviteText: Generate invite link and share the space with other members
popupSettingsSpaceIndexShareLinkText: Share this invite link so that others can join your Space
popupSettingsSpaceIndexShareManageText: Copy invite link, approve requests and manage members
popupSettingsSpaceIndexStorageText: You can store up to %s of your files on our encrypted backup node for free. If you reach the limit, files will be stored only locally.
popupSettingsSpaceIndexHomepageDescripti: Select an Object to show when you login
popupSettingsSpaceCreateUsecaseTitle: How do you want to start?
popupSettingsSpaceCreateUsecaseLabel: We can load some objects for you
popupSettingsImportText: Choose application or format of data source
popupSettingsImportCsvText: Select a Zip archive or CSV file (.csv) to complete the import
popupSettingsImportFavouriteTitle: Selected objects will appear in your Favorites widget
popupSettingsExportText: Choose application or format of data source
popupSettingsExportMarkdownText1: All your workspace data except columns and text color styling will be exported to markdown. It's a free and readable format that can be opened and edited with many free and beautiful applications.
popupSettingsExportMarkdownText2: If you want to add all your data back in Anytype, use the Import section.
popupSettingsSpaceHomepageText: Select an Object to show when you login
popupSettingsSpaceShareInviteLinkLabel: Share this link to invite others to your Space. Once they request to join, you can set their access rights.
popupSettingsSpaceShareGenerateInviteDis: You need to be online to share the space
popupSettingsSpaceRemoveText: Τα μέλη δεν μπορούσαν πλέον να δουν αντικείμενα μέσα
popupSettingsMembershipText: Joining Anytype network means contributing to its story
popupSettingsMembershipSlide0Text: As a valued member your voice matters! Engage in exclusive events, shape strategic choices, and influence our roadmap.
popupSettingsMembershipSlide1Text: Members enjoy higher backup storage & sync limits, invitations for multiple guests to collaborate in shared spaces, and a unique identity on the Anytype Network.
popupSettingsMembershipSlide2Text: Your contribution supports our team and endorses our vision of a user-owned, secure, and collaborative digital network.
popupSettingsMembershipSlide3Text: Our network's value exceeds the sum of its parts. Your membership sustains the infrastructure for its growth which underpins this network.
popupSettingsMembershipSpecial: Would you like to use Anytype for business, education, etc.? Please let us know here︎.
popupSettingsOnboardingLocalOnlyWarningT:
Anytype can't transfer your data between directories.
Your Spaces data will be downloaded from another device.
Please ensure that you have such a device active on the same network.
popupSettingsDataOffloadWarningText: Όλα τα πολυμέσα που είναι αποθηκευμένα στο Anytype θα διαγραφούν από την τρέχουσα συσκευή. Μπορούν να μεταφορτωθούν ξανά από έναν κόμβο αντιγράφων ασφαλείας ή από άλλη συσκευή.
popupSettingsDataOffloadWarningTextLocal: Be careful: your client is in local-only mode, and data is not backing up to external nodes. Ensure that your files are synced to your other devices before removing them.
popupSettingsDeleteTitle1: 1. You have 30 days to cancel vault deletion
popupSettingsDeleteText1: Λυπούμαστε που φεύγετε. Μόλις ζητήσετε να διαγραφεί ο λογαριασμός σας, έχετε 30 ημέρες να ακυρώσετε το αίτημά σας. Μετά από 30 ημέρες, τα δεδομένα του λογαριασμού σας θα αφαιρεθούν οριστικά από τον κόμβο αντιγράφων ασφαλείας, και δε θα μπορείτε να συνδεθείτε στο Anytype από νέες συσκευές.
popupSettingsDeleteTitle2: 2. Διαγράψτε τα δεδομένα από άλλες συσκευές
popupSettingsDeleteText2: Δεδομένου ότι το Anytype αποθηκεύει όλα σας τα δεδομένα τοπικά στη συσκευή σας, πρέπει να τα αφαιρέσετε και από άλλες συσκευές. Εκκινήστε το Anytype και διαγράψτε τα δεδομένα, ή απλά διαγράψτε ολόκληρη την εφαρμογή.
popupSettingsDeleteCheckboxLabel: I have read it and want to delete my vault
popupSettingsImportCsvUseFirstRow: Χρήση της πρώτης γραμμής ως ονόματα στηλών
popupSettingsImportNotionHelpTitle: Πώς να κάνετε εισαγωγή από το Notion
popupSettingsImportNotionHelpStep12: Open My Connections and then click Develop or manage integrations.
popupSettingsImportNotionHelpStep13: Κλικ στο Νέα Ενσωμάτωση ή Δημιουργία Νέας Ενσωμάτωσης
popupSettingsImportNotionHelpStep14: Επιλέξτε το χώρο εργασίας σας και ορίστε Όνομα για ενσωμάτωση.
popupSettingsImportNotionHelpStep15:
Important! ️Go to Capabilities and select following capabilities and press Save changes:
  • Read content
  • Read user information
️
popupSettingsImportNotionHelpStep16: Copy Internal Integration Secret for connecting and importing your data.
popupSettingsImportNotionHelpStep2Descr: Add integration to the pages you want to import into Anytype. Page will be imported with all children documents. Select your root object to import all objects.
popupSettingsImportNotionHelpStep21: Click on three dots on the upper right corner, then click Connect to (you need to scroll the menu). Select your Anytype integration.
popupSettingsImportNotionHelpStep22: Press Confirm. Now you just need to paste your Internal Integration Token to Anytype.
popupSettingsImportNotionWarningTitle: Some data formats will be imported as text
popupSettingsImportNotionWarningLi1: All @mentions will be converted to text
popupSettingsImportNotionWarningLi2: Date ranges will be imported as text
popupSettingsImportNotionWarningLi3: Formulas and rollups will be placed as values
popupSettingsImportNotionWarningLi4: Databases will look as Objects with Relations in Anytype documents
popupSettingsImportNotionDescription: Import your Notion files through the Notion API with 3 simple steps
popupSettingsImportNotionHowTo: Πώς να κάνετε εισαγωγή από το Notion
popupSettingsImportNotionIntegrationList: Create the integration you need to get Notion files
Settings & members → My connections → Develop or manage integrations → New integration
Provide read user information capability to integration
Integration settings → Capabilities → Read user information without email addresses
Add integration to the pages you want to import
Select document → ... → Add Connections → Confirm Integration
popupMembershipFreeTitleStep1: Get your free membership with just your email!
popupMembershipFreeTitleStep2: Enter the code sent to your email
popupMembershipFreeText: We need your email to keep spam at bay and the fun in play!
popupMembershipFreeCheckboxText: I'd like to get updates on products and enjoy free perks!
popupMembershipCurrentEmailTitle: Get updates and enjoy free perks!
popupMembershipCurrentEmailText: It is not linked to your vault in any way.
popupMembershipPaidTextPerYear: This is your unique name on the Anytype network, confirming your Membership. It acts as your personal domain and cannot be changed within a year.
popupMembershipPaidTextPerYears: This is your unique name on the Anytype network, confirming your Membership. It acts as your personal domain and cannot be changed within %s %s.
popupMembershipStatusNameNotAvailable: Oops! This name is already taken!
popupMembershipPaidOnOtherPlatform: You've already acquired Membership plan on another platform, please cancel Membership first.
popupMembershipPaidByCrypto: To upgrade your membership using cryptocurrency, please contact Anytype.
popupMembershipSuccessVerificationTitle: Thank you for confirming your email!
popupMembershipSuccessVerificationText: You are now set to receive the latest updates and perks. Enjoy exploring!
popupMembershipCode6: This tier does not support name
popupConfirmUpdatePromptText: Θέλετε να αναβαθμίσετε σε νέα έκδοση;
popupConfirmUpdateErrorText:
Αδυναμία ελέγχου για ενημερώσεις, παρακαλώ δοκιμάστε αργότερα.
%s
popupConfirmNeedUpdateText: Some of your data was managed in a newer version of Anytype. Please update the app to work with all your docs and the latest features.
popupConfirmObjectOpenErrorText: There was a problem while opening the object, please send the debug info to the support team.
popupConfirmStopSharingSpaceText: Members will no longer sync to this space and the share link will be deactivated.
popupConfirmMemberRemoveText: %s will be removed from the space
popupConfirmMemberChangeText: %s access to the space would become %s
popupConfirmRevokeLinkText: New members won’t be able to join the space. You can generate a new link anytime.
popupConfirmSpaceShareMoreInfoText:
• Please provide the link to the person you'd like to collaborate with.
  • By clicking the link, a person requests to join the space.
  • After approving the request, you can choose the access rights for that person.
popupConfirmDuplicateSpace: You are already a member of this space
popupConfirmInviteError: The link you have tried to use does not seem to work
popupConfirmWelcomeText:
Your Space is an encrypted, local-first container.
Spaces can be shared and co-created with others.
Each space contains a Graph of objects.
popupConfirmWelcomeButton: Show me what I can build
popupConfirmLostPhraseTitle: Anytype cannot recover your Key for you
popupConfirmLostPhraseTextWindows:
Currently, there are no methods of accessing your key, as we do not store a copy of it. Check out the other places where it might stored:

  • In system password storage. We did it for you automatically
  • Inside a password manager if you use one
  • On a piece of paper stored in a secure place chosen prior
popupConfirmLostPhraseTextLinux:
Currently, there are no methods of accessing your key, as we do not store a copy of it. Check out the other places where it might stored:

  • In system password storage. We did it for you automatically
  • Inside a password manager if you use one
  • On a piece of paper stored in a secure place chosen prior
popupConfirmLostPhraseTextMac:
Currently, there are no methods of accessing your key, as we do not store a copy of it. Check out the other places where it might stored:

  • Inside a password manager if you use one

popupConfirmMembershipUpgradeText: Reach us for extra storage, space editors, or more shared spaces. Anytype team will provide details and conditions tailored to your needs.
popupConfirmRelationOptionRemoveText: Deleting relation options can affect your objects. Once confirmed, the action cannot be undone.
popupConfirmDeleteWarningTitle: Are you sure you want to delete %s %s?

popupInviteRequestNote: Once the space owner approves your request, you'll join the space with the access rights owner determined.
popupInviteInviteConfirmText: You will receive a notification when the space owner will approve your request.

popupShortcutCommandDescription: After pressing / start writing the block name to choose the right one without a mouse, change block colors, and activate actions.
popupShortcutCommandObjects1: Create an Object with a relative date. Also available: @three days ago, @last month, @2016-05-12
popupMigrationOnboardingText1:
You're now using the new & improved version of Anytype.
It's still encrypted, offline-first and the safest app for your personal information.
popupMigrationOnboardingText2: The updated version of Anytype on iOS and Android is also available for download! If you haven't already, please scan this QR code to update your devices:
popupMigrationOnboardingText3: We're excited to hear your feedback about the new features.
popupMigrationImportText1: Please take a few moments to check that your data has been imported correctly.
popupMigrationImportText2: One last thing. The updated version of Anytype on iOS and Android is also available for download! If you haven't already, please scan this QR code to update your devices:
popupMigrationImportText3: In case of any issues, you can repeat the migration process using the legacy desktop app or visit our community forum.
popupPhraseLabel1: It is represented by a recovery phrase – 12 random words from which your vault is magically generated on this device.
popupPhraseLabel2: Whomever knows the combination of these words owns your vault. Right now, you are the only person in the world who knows it.
popupPhraseLabel3: All computational resources on Earth are not enough to break in. If you lose it, it cannot be recovered. So, store it somewhere safe!
popupPhraseLabel4: The easiest way to store your Key is to save it in your password manager.
popupPhraseLabel5: The most secure way is to write it down on paper and keep it offline, in a safe and secure place.
popupUsecaseListText:
Explore experiences made by power users.
Simply install to your space and boost up your workflow.
popupUsecaseListEmptyCategory: No Experiences found in the %s category

survey0Text: Hi there! We hope you're enjoying your experience in Anytype! We'd love to hear your feedback so we can keep improving the product.
survey1Text: We'd love to learn more about why you've chosen to delete your vault. Would you be willing to take 3 minutes to help us improve?
survey2Text: Hi there! We'd love if you'd help us improve Anytype by taking part in this 5-minute survey.
survey3Text: Hi there, we hope you're enjoying your experience with Anytype! Would you take 5 minutes to help us improve our product?
survey4Text: Take our 1-minute survey to enhance space sharing. Your input makes Anytype better for everyone.
survey5Text: Take our 1-minute survey to enhance collaboration. Your input makes Anytype better for everyone.
widget3Description: Widget with a compact list view
widget4Description: Widget with a Set or Collection layout
widgetEmptyLabelCreate:
There are no Objects here,
create the first one
spaceDeleteWarningText: This space will be deleted irrevocably. You can't undo this action.
spaceLeaveWarningText: "%s" will be removed from your devices and you will no longer have access to it
deletedBanner: This Object is in the Bin and is shown in view mode
onboardingMainGraph11: Space is essentially a graph, and Anytype aims to provide a natural way of thinking where everything is represented as objects with specific relationships, just like in the real world.
onboardingMainSet11: Anytype has two basic formats: Sets and Collections. As in computer science, a Set is a data structure that contains only unique elements, while a Collection is any group of objects that are stored together. You can convert any set into a collection, but not the other way around.
onboardingMainSet21: Sets contain no duplicates and can be used to filter specific objects or relation types, such as all my bookmarks. Collections, however, can contain duplicates and are used for more general-purpose data storage; they can store anything.
onboardingMainSet31: View sets or collections as an entire object, or place them inline in documents. The first column will contain the collecting objects, and the others will show their relations.
onboardingMainSet32: Filter and adjust objects by any relation, such as today's notes (filter by date) or project documents (filter by project).
onboardingStoreType11: This Library contains all types of Objects and Relations. It comes with preinstalled types, as well as types that can be uploaded to Anytype for different use cases.
onboardingStoreType21: You can create your own types with any object layout for your own purposes. Additionally, you can save any existing object as a Library template if you need to use it frequently.
onboardingStoreType22: Now, let’s take a look at the Relations menu.
onboardingStoreRelation11: Relations are reusable links with meaning. Here you can see some examples of Relations, but the idea is that you can create your own Relations which are valuable to you and connect the Objects through them.
onboardingStoreRelation21: Establishing Relations helps you to understand the graph and its structure better. You can also create Collections or Sets based on the relationships for quick access.
onboardingObjectCreationStart11: Let’s create an object from scratch. The default object type is now ‘Note’, meaning that each new object is referred to as a Note unless you choose a different type. You can change the default object type anytime in the settings menu.
onboardingObjectCreationStart21: Choose here from the most popular object types, such as Page, Task, or Collection. You can also select an object from the Type menu, which shows all object types installed from the Library.
onboardingObjectCreationFinish11: For the Object you created, you can adjust it using the top menu. Change the cover, layout, or set up a relations to build the graph.
onboardingDashboard1Title: Let's start by quickly exploring Anytype's key features.
onboardingDashboard1Text:
Prefer to do it later?
Just hit the ? button and then Show hints when you feel ready.
onboardingDashboard2Title: Widgets on the left provide quick access to objects in your space.
onboardingDashboard2Text: Personalize them by clicking the Edit Widgets button.
onboardingDashboard31: Well done! Jump to Sets or Library from the sidebar to explore more or continue by importing your data and making it your own.
onboardingDashboard32: For help, press the ? button.
onboardingEditor1Description: Use the @ symbol to refer to other objects while writing, and the / symbol to create text styles, objects, and more.
onboardingEditor2Description: Drag and drop files and images from your computer into the editor window, or copy and paste text to create new blocks. Try it out!
onboardingEditor3Description: Click above to view the Relation menu, where you can find object links as properties.
onboardingEditor4Description: Click below to see how new objects are connected in your own graph by links and relations!
onboardingTypeDeleted1Description: If you want to keep using this Object, change this Object Type.
onboardingSourceDeleted1Title: Please check your Installed Types & Relations
onboardingSourceDeleted1Description: Some Objects in this Set use Types or Relations that have been removed from your Space. Visit the Library to re-install these entities and continue using your Set.
onboardingInlineSet1Description: Congratulations! You can embed a Set or Collection and modify it using Filters and Views without altering the original instance.
onboardingInlineSet2Description: Adjust rules and views to suit the current context.
onboardingInlineCollection1Description: Congratulations! You can embed a set or collection and modify it using filters and views without altering the original instance.
onboardingInlineCollection2Description: Adjust rules and views to suit the current context.
onboardingDefaultTypeDescription: You can change type and template of a new object in this menu.
onboardingCalendarDescription: Display objects on a calendar based on selected date attributes.
onboardingTemplateSelectDescription: Easily switch your templates when creating objects.
onboardingQuickCaptureDescription: Select types for your objects to categorize and connect them.
onboardingShareSpaceTitle: Co-create, share and collaborate on Spaces!
onboardingShareSpaceDescription: Click the space widget to open space settings. From there, you can share the space and invite members to collaborate.
libActionUninstallTypeTitle: Do you want to remove Type "%s"?
libActionUninstallTypeText: This Type and any associated Templates will be removed. If you have created any Objects with this Type, they may become more difficult to locate.
libActionUninstallRelationTitle: Do you want to remove Relation "%s"?
libActionUninstallRelationText: This Relation will be removed from your Library. If you have created any Objects with which use this Relation, you will no longer be able to edit the Relation value.
